list group everyone * -//...
read group * * -//depot/.../base/build/deleteorgs.txt
=write group everyone * -//depot/.../base/db/upgrade-scripts/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/.../base/db/upgrade-scripts/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/.../base/db/my_db/upgrade-scripts/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/.../base/asdf/config/my_schema.xml
=write group everyone * -//depot/.../base/db/plpgsql/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/6*/*/base/schema-api/java/src/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/6*/*/base/schema/submodules/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/6*/*/base/foo-xml/java/resources/foo/foo-schema-catalog.xml
=write group everyone * -//depot/6*/*/base/foo-xml/java/resources/foo/foo-custom-schema.xml
=write group everyone * -//depot/6*/*/base/schema-catalog/java/src/...
=write group everyone * -//depot/6*/*/base/asdf/plsql/base/cCustomField*.sql
write group groupdb * -//depot/6*/*/base/asdf/plsql/base/cCustomSchema*.sql
write group groupdb * //depot/*/*/base/db/upgrade-scripts/...
write group groupdb * //depot/*/*/base/db/my_db/upgrade-scripts/...
write group groupdb * //depot/*/*/base/asdf/config/my_schema.xml
write group groupdb * //depot/*/*/base/db/plpgsql/...
